Notes on Recognitions

  • ESA 2013 Best Paper Award (Co-winner) List H-Coloring a Graph by Removing Few Vertices by Rajesh Chitnis, László Egri, Dániel Marx (see Computational Complexity Theory)
  • STACS 2010 Special Issue (Top 6 Paper) & Best of 2012 Recognition
    The Complexity of the List Homomorphism Problem for Graphs by László Egri, Andrei A. Krokhin, Benoît Larose, Pascal Tesson (see Computational Complexity Theory)

Neural Networks, Cognitive Science, Computer Vision

  • A compositional neural-network solution to prime-number testing
    Egri, L., & Shultz, T. R.
